attributes.action: Stop arresting people for carrying the Union Flag.
attributes.additional_details:
Stop arresting people, in Britain, for carrying the Union Flag.
For example the pregnent white lady, on YouTube, in Oldham, who was reported to the police by a couple of black people for carrying the Union Flag, then the police proceeded to arrest her for being a racist. (Should not the accusers have been arrested for the same offence, or for causing an action liable to cause a disturbance of the peace?)
This country should be proud of its nationality and, like in the USA, should fly the flag from every public building and you should be able to fly the flag from your own home, if you so wish.

rejection.details: This is a police operational matter
